text_1.text:
This is EmpireCraft! It is a survival server with a few rules to follow. Please accept the rules to play!
 Rule 1: Don't be rude to other players. Remember this is a server for all ages!
 Rule 2: Don't spawn kill. Spawn killing removes all the fun and games making people want to leave.
 Rule 3: Don't cheat this includes x-ray, hacking and using unfair texture packs for an advantage.
 Rule 4: Don't kill new players. Killing new players also removes the fun because they have little to no armour while you might have maxed out armour. 
 Rule 5: Have fun! Invite your friends and enjoy the server!

on_click.command: /tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"§cRules Declined! Please accept the rules to play!"}]}
